You are working with tiktok data and collect survey data, you also mention privacy aspects to take into account in the sharing section, if you will collect personal data, even when publicly available or only indirectly identifying a person (e.g. an ip address), please register this in the the KU Leuvenâ€™s internal processing of personal data register via PRET. For more information see: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index; if you are not sure if you collect personal data please contact pret@kuleuven.be
Please note that data preservation on hard drives is not very secure and onedrive is not suitable since this expires when you leave KU Leuven, consult the storage guide to find an alternative: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
